pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, May 27, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, May 27, 2016:

Kashikojima, Shima, Japan

9:00 a.m. JST The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Session V.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


10:00 a.m. JST The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Session I with outreach partners.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


11:30 a.m. JST The Prime Minister will take part in the G7 Official Family Photograph with outreach partners.

Garden, 2nd Floor
Shima Kanko Hotel The Classic

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


11:50 a.m. JST The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Luncheon Session II with outreach partners.

Closed to media.

2:45 p.m. JST The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Garden
Shima Spain Mura Hotel

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage


7:45 p.m. JST The Prime Minister will depart Kashikojima, Shima, Japan.


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations: 
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
